DESCRIPTION: Applies the #yCyloop status on the enemy. It can be consumed to activate #yCyloop #yFinisher effects, or applied again to deal HP-based damage.
If the target is affected by #yCyloop, consumes it to trigger an additional effect.
Blocks next incoming damage at the price of all your Rings. May recover some of the lost Rings next turn, depending on high the amount lost was.
Gain Rings equal to the amount of this buff at the start of your next turn.
